Summary Note:
The RM is Muñoz Díaz López's brother-in-law, having married his's sister. This family connection has strengthened their professional collaboration, allowing for seamless communication and trust.
With a career spanning nearly 31 years, Muñoz Díaz López has established himself as a key player in the industry.
He decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Muñoz Díaz López is married to Clara. Muñoz and Clara have 2 children, named Ruiz and Ibáñez.
Education Background:
In 1988, Muñoz finished his secondary school education at IES Ginés Martínez de Aranda Albacete.
He then attended Ramón Llull University, which he graduated in 1994.
He pursued addtionally further eduaction by attending Valencia School of Fine Arts and graduating in 1998.
Occupation History:
Having worked for over 31 years, Muñoz Díaz López brings a wealth of experience and expertise to his current role. He is known for his strategic thinking and ability to drive results.
At Mediaset España Comunicación S.A., Muñoz Díaz López held the position of Journalist from 1994 to 1999, developing essential skills in the field.
He then transitioned to Atresmedia Corporación de Medios de Comunicación S.A. as a Editor, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2000 to 2003.
His tenure as a Publisher at Mediaset España Comunicación S.A. from 2005 to 2007 was marked by significant achievements and a deepening understanding of the field.
He worked as a TV/Radio Host at PRISA Noticias S.A. from 2009 to 2025, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 690000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He owns villa in Almería, where he resides. It is worth 2270000 EUR.

He purchased house in Logroño, where he spends his holidays. It is valued at 1240000 EUR.

In addition to his career success, he also received an inheritance of 660000 EUR from his late mother, a renowned Hedge Fund Manager, in 2012.
Client Summary: In summary, Muñoz has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
